metadata.title: CVE-2022-38072 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in thestl_fix_normal_directions functionality of ADMesh Master Commit 767a105 andv0.98.4. A specially-crafted stl file can lead to a heap buffer overflow.An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: admesh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
